cars.name: BMW
cars.history: BMW (Bayerische Motoren Werke) is known for its luxury and performance vehicles.

popular_models.name: M-Series
popular_models.info: The BMW M-Series includes high-performance sports cars designed for enthusiasts.

popular_models.name: X-Series
popular_models.info: BMW's luxury SUV lineup offers power, technology, and comfort.

popular_models.name: i-Series
popular_models.info: BMW’s electric vehicle lineup focuses on sustainability and innovation.

cars.name: Mercedes
cars.history: Mercedes-Benz is a pioneer in luxury automotive engineering.

popular_models.name: AMG
popular_models.info: Mercedes-AMG offers high-performance versions of Mercedes-Benz cars.

popular_models.name: S-Class
popular_models.info: A flagship luxury sedan known for its cutting-edge technology and comfort.

popular_models.name: G-Class
popular_models.info: A luxury SUV with off-road capability and an iconic boxy design.

popular_models.name: C-Class
popular_models.info: A compact executive car offering a balance of luxury and sportiness.

cars.name: Lamborghini
cars.history: Lamborghini is known for its high-performance and exotic supercars.

popular_models.name: Huracán
popular_models.info: A V10-powered supercar with aggressive styling and extreme speed.

popular_models.name: Aventador
popular_models.info: Lamborghini’s flagship V12 supercar, known for its extreme performance.

popular_models.name: Revuelto
popular_models.info: Lamborghini’s hybrid supercar featuring a V12 engine combined with electric motors.

popular_models.name: Urus
popular_models.info: The Lamborghini Urus is a high-performance SUV with a 4.0-liter twin-turbo V8 engine, reaching a top speed of 305 km/h (190 mph) and accelerating from 0 to 100 km/h in 3.6 seconds.
